scenes.background: Monica prepares her notes. You decide to look up trends quickly.
scenes.description: [Bob] says, 'The trends data is taking too long. Should we just focus on the slides?'

options.text: We can manage both if we split the tasks. I'll keep looking up trends while you work on the slides.
options.analysis: You show high social skills and emotional perception by suggesting a split-task approach, but you may overextend yourself, affecting self-regulation and empathy.

options.text: You're right, let's focus on polishing the slides first. We can add the trends later if we have time.
options.analysis: You exhibit strong self-regulation and a focus on immediate tasks, but your motivation to dive deep into the trends is limited.

options.text: I'm almost done with the trends. Let's incorporate them now to make our presentation more impactful.
options.analysis: You show empathy and determination by wanting to include the trends immediately, but your emotional perception is slightly lower due to potential time constraints.
